Run4YourBits

Class SimpleSoundPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Run4YourBits.SimpleSoundPlayer

  • public class SimpleSoundPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The SimpleSoundPlayer class encapsulates a sound that can be opened from the file system and later played.
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleSoundPlayer(javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format, byte[] samples)
      Player construction
      SimpleSoundPlayer(java.lang.String filename)
      Opens a sound from a file.
